activities: NCS Pearson, Inc. through its Pearson VUE and Certiport businesses are under contract to perform global computer-based testing and assessment services on behalf of assessment, certification, licensure, and academic admission testing program owners and ourselves; and through its Pearson Credential Management business who is under contract to manage, maintain, and host credentialing data on behalf of individuals for providing verification services to third parties including current and potential employers and background checking firms.  We receive and process personal information from individuals, including individuals located in the EU/EEA and Switzerland, for purposes of providing testing, assessment, verification, and related services on behalf of our global testing program owners.
